resources.string: CREATE TABLE waypoints ( iconindex INTEGER, name TEXT, description TEXT, latitude INTEGER, longitude INTEGER );
CREATE TABLE routes ( routeid INTEGER PRIMARY KEY AUTOINCREMENT, name TEXT, description TEXT, origin TEXT, destination TEXT, planspeed INTEGER, departuretime INTEGER, color TEXT );
CREATE TABLE routepoints ( pointid INTEGER PRIMARY KEY AUTOINCREMENT, routeid INTEGER, nextpointid INTEGER, latitude INTEGER, longitude INTEGER );
CREATE TABLE tracks ( trackid INTEGER PRIMARY KEY AUTOINCREMENT, name TEXT, description TEXT, origin TEXT, destination TEXT, starttime INTEGER, stoptime INTEGER, color TEXT );
CREATE TABLE trackpoints ( pointid INTEGER PRIMARY KEY AUTOINCREMENT, trackid INTEGER, nextpointid INTEGER, latitude INTEGER, longitude INTEGER );
